post.author: vertex007
post.body:
------------
------------
WOLF_REDUX
vers_1.3
vertex007
------------
------------
13-09-2009
------------





This mod for Wolfenstein 2009 (SP) enhances and corrects some aspects of the game without affecting gameplay balance or performance.
Some of the tweaks featured are directly implemented from other mods (Risk-a, Neurowolf, Deconsolized), others have been adjusted or created by me.


Features


HUD

- Removed Button Tips on hud (like press F to pickup or Press R to reload)
- Removed Stab icon on hud
- Removed health warning from hud
- Removed Veil Amulet from hud

MENU

- Shortened transition time for ingame mainmenu
- Removed Intel voice-overs (see Language Pack)

MISC

- FOV increased from 80 to 90
- Adjusted head bob
- Removed the highlight glint from dropped weapons
- Increased the lifetime of breakables and dead bodies
- Added quick saves functionality
- Added screenshots functionality
- Max corpses increased
- Decreased sprint start delay
- Increased stamina recharge and max sprint time
- Removed directional indicator of planted dynamite
- Nazis speak german (see Language Pack)


download Wolf Redux core:

http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?yjhgmmmmtzk


download Language Pack

http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?wtyz0qnytdi


Mirrors:


http://www.wolfedit.com/files/wolf/mods/mods.html
